item.title: About Cosmiqo
item.description: Founded in 2013 in the trade hub of Singapore, Cosmiqo seeks to empower global supply chains with analytics and optimization engines enabling increased productivity, orchestration and visibility for supply chain operations.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Get in touch with us. We’d love to hear from you.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Get in touch with us We'd love to hear from you Thank you for contacting us. We will get in touch with you soon. Singapore 10 Anson Road, International Plaza #33-04A Singapore 079903 Shah Alam, Selangor No. 13-M (Mezzanine Floor) Jalan Tengku Ampuan Zabedah J9/J Shah Alam Selangor, 40100 Malaysia

item.title: Cosmiqo Addresses Today's Warehousing Challenges
item.description: Learn how Cosmiqo addresses today’s warehousing challenges.

item.title: Cosmiqo Litesense®
item.description: Real-time data collection. Lamp identification and intensity mapping on-the-go.

item.title: Elevate current operations with
item.description: Improve material and process flow orchestration, optimization and visibility for your human-centric warehouses.

item.title: Join the team. Make a difference.
item.description: Join the team. Make a difference.

item.title: Leadership
item.description: Our trail-blazing team have been involved in running global supply chains, enabling the technological evolution of logistics and are at the forefront of some of its largest strategic changes.

item.title: MAVIS™
item.description: Machine Visibility. MAVIS™ provides full visibility of operations through a resilient sensing backbone and powerful analytics engine.

item.title: Newsroom
item.description: We are trusted by the world’s leading companies and industry-leading partners. Find out what Cosmiqo has been up to and reach out to the press team.

item.title: Plan assets and execute operations with certainty
item.description: IRIS Warehouse Simulator enables data-driven warehousing assets and operation planning for the most accurate allocation of resources possible.

item.title: Take Advantage of Our Partner Ecosystem
item.description: Cosmiqo partners are the foundation of our success. We connect you with top partners to help you meet your technology goals, access implementation and integration with Cosmiqo-as-a-service.

item.title: Tomorrow’s Fulfilment, Today.
item.description: IRIS is tomorrow’s fulfilment, today. IRIS™ is the backbone for Cosmiqo’s A.I. and proprietary algorithms used in decision-making.

item.title: Transform robotic operations with
item.description: Re-imagine material and process flow orchestration, optimization and visibility for your robot-centric warehouses and manufacturing shop floors.

item.title: Why Cosmiqo?
item.description: Cosmiqo helps organizations remove material and process flow inefficiencies through orchestration, optimization and visibility for human loose-picking & robot warehousing.
